Module FFMpeg::MainOptions
In: lib/ffmpeg/main_options.rb

Methods

album   author   comment   copyright   duration   file_size_limit   frames_to_record   offset   overwrite_existing_file   seek   source   subtitle_codec   target   target   title   track   year  

Public Instance methods

album(album)

Set the album. 

  album "An awesome album"
author(author)

Set the author. 

  author "PMH"
comment(comment)

Set the comment. 

  comment "Some comment"
copyright(copyright)

Set the copyright. 

  copyright "(c) Patrik Hedman 2009"
duration(duration)

Set the duration specified in seconds. hh:mm:ss[.xxx] syntax is also supported 

  duration "600"

or 

  duration "00:10:00"
file_size_limit(limit)

Set a file size limit in bytes 

  file_size_limit 104_857_600
frames_to_record(frames)

Set the number of frames to record. 

  frames_to_record 50
offset(offset)

Set the input time offset in seconds.

-]hh:mm:ss[.xxx
syntax is also supported.

This option affects all the input files that follow it. The offset is added to the timestamps of the input files. Specifying a positive offset means that the corresponding streams are delayed by ‘offset’ seconds. 

  offset "600"

or 

  offset "00:10:00"
overwrite_existing_file()

Overwrite output file if it already exists

seek(position)

Seek to given time position in seconds. hh:mm:ss[.xxx] syntax is also supported. 

  seek "600"

or 

  seek "00:10:00"
source(*filename)
subtitle_codec(codec)

Force subtitle codec (‘copy’ to copy stream)

target(target)
target(target)

Specify target file type ("vcd", "svcd", "dvd", "dv", "dv50", "pal-vcd", "ntsc-svcd", … ). All the format options (bitrate, codecs, buffer sizes) are then set automatically. Nevertheless you can specify additional options as long as you know they do not conflict with the standard. 

  target "vcd"
title(title)

Set the title. 

  title "Some Title"
track(track)

Set the track number: 

  track 1
year(year)

Set the year. 

  year 1985

[Validate]
